This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] defaultbutton: <select disabled> should prevent focus and activation with appearance:base-select.
  assert_true: This test requires appearance:base-select in order to run. expected true got false
[FAIL] custombutton: <select disabled> should prevent focus and activation with appearance:base-select.
  assert_true: This test requires appearance:base-select in order to run. expected true got false
